mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lodge (lodge_name, lodge_address_name, lodge_phone, lodge_id, chk_in_date, chk_out_date, book_date, user_email) VALUES (#{lodgeName}, #{lodgeAddressName}, #{lodgePhone}, #{lodgeId}, #{chkInDate}, #{chkOutDate}, now(), #{userEmail})
mapper.select: SELECT seq, lodge_name, lodge_img, lodge_score, room_img, room_name, room_type, room_price, room_count, chk_in_date, chk_out_date, sold_out FROM lodge_room WHERE sold_out = 'Y' AND lodge_name=#{pName}
select * from lodge_room where room_count = #{roomCount} and lodge_name=#{lodgeName}
SELECT * FROM lodge_room WHERE (#{chkInDate} > chk_out_date or #{chkOutDate} <chk_in_date or (chk_in_date IS NULL AND chk_out_date IS NULL) ) and lodge_name=#{lodgeName}
SELECT * FROM lodge_room WHERE (#{chkInDate} > chk_out_date or #{chkOutDate} <chk_in_date or (chk_in_date IS NULL AND chk_out_date IS NULL) ) and lodge_name=#{lodgeName} and room_count=#{roomCount}
